content: Was there ever any discussion on adding inner syntax antiquotations? What I am imagining here is that you can antiquote in Isabelle/HOL and just use some ML code to produce a term in the antiquoted place, e.g. definition "test = 1 + @{ML "HOLogic.mk_numeral 2"}. (The syntax is up for debate)
If you want to know more, ask Lars about it.
